search_results.snippet: K18 Biomimetic Hairscience co-founder Suveen Sahib had an aha moment! Leaving his work in the tech industry, he set out on a charged mission to understand the ...

search_results.title: Science behind K18
search_results.snippet: The K18PEPTIDE™ is a biotech-developed peptide that mimics hair's structure to reverse damage by reconnecting broken polypeptide chains and disulfide bonds.

search_results.title: K18 Hair | Biomimetic Hairscience | Official Site
search_results.snippet: Most of the product leave my hair greasy and I can't even style it, and right after washing I have to put it in the bun. It's a nightmare! But not with k-18.
